main.access_denied_detail: The user is not allowed to access the administration backend.
main.force_readonly_datasets_help: Suppresses any write permissions when generating dataset permissons. Useful to quickly set all datasets to read-only.
main.subtitle: Administration tool for QWC services
main.timeout_error:
The generation of the configuration took too long. Likely causes:
- There is a network connectivity issue
- Fetching the Capabilities took too long (too many themes / too many layers / slow remote layers)
- The 'proxy_read_timeout' of the qwc-api-gateway is too low
main.title: QWC Admin
main.use_cached_project_metadata: Use cached project metadata if available
main.use_cached_project_metadata_help: Use cached WMS/WMTS capabilities for themes and external layers, if available, and skips regeneration of the theme thumbnails. Useful to quickly regenerate the configuration if only permission or service configuration changes were performed but no changes to the project files.

theme.background_layer_message: (Optional): The initial visibility of this background layer when loading the theme.
theme.form_additionalMouseCrs_description: Additional CRS for the mouse coordinate display.
theme.form_attribution_description: Theme attribution, is displayed in the bottom right corner of the map.
theme.form_collapseLayerGroupsBelowLevel_descr: Layer tree level below which to initially collapse groups. By default the tree is completely expanded.
theme.form_defaultPrintLayout_description: Name of print layout to select by default.
theme.form_default_description: Whether to use this theme as initial theme.
theme.form_description_description: An additional description to show below the theme title.
theme.form_extent_description: Override theme extent. In mapCrs. [xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax].
theme.form_extent_message: Please enter a comma separted list of 4 numbers.
theme.form_extraDxfParameters_description: Additional query parameters to append to DXF export request.
theme.form_extraDxfParameters_message: Please enter a comma separted list of KEY=VALUE.
theme.form_extraLegendParameters_description: Additional query parameters to append to GetLegendGraphic request.
theme.form_extraLegendParameters_message: Please enter a comma separted list of KEY=VALUE.
theme.form_extraPrintLayers_description: Extra list of layers to mark as internal print layers, i.e. which are omitted from the QWC LayerTree.
theme.form_extraPrintLayers_message: Please enter a comma separted list of names.
theme.form_extraPrintParameters_description: Additional query parameters to append to GetPrint request.
theme.form_extraPrintParameters_message: Please enter a comma separted list of KEY=VALUE.
theme.form_flags_description: List of arbitrary flag names. The visibility of menu items, toolbar items and map buttons can be controlled based on the flags a theme declares.
theme.form_flags_message: Please enter a comma separted list of names.
theme.form_format_description: Image format requested from the WMS Service. Default is 'image/png'.
theme.form_layerTreeHiddenSublayers_descriptio: List of sublayer names to omit in layertree (but still displayed in map).
theme.form_layerTreeHiddenSublayers_message: Please enter a comma separted list of names.
theme.form_mapTips_description: Enable the theme tooltip by default
theme.form_minSearchScaleDenom_description: Minimum scale to enforce when zooming to search results.
theme.form_printLabelBlacklist_description: List of composer label ids to not expose in the print dialog.
theme.form_printLabelBlacklist_message: Please enter a comma separted list of names.
theme.form_printLabelForAttribution_descriptio: ID of a print layout label to which the current attribution text (if any) will be written to when printing.
theme.form_printLabelForSearchResult_descripti: ID of a print layout label to which the current search result text (if any) will be written to when printing.
theme.form_printResolutions_message: Please enter a comma separted list of numbers.
theme.form_printScales_message: Please enter a comma separted list of numbers.
theme.form_scales_message: Please enter a comma separted list of numbers.
theme.form_skipEmptyFeatureAttributes_descript: Whether to omit empty attributes from the feature information.
theme.form_thumbnail_description: Filename of the theme thumbnail. By default, autogenerated via WMS GetMap.
theme.form_tileSize_message: Please enter a comma separted list of 2 numbers.
theme.print_layer_message: (Optional): Name of a layer of the QGIS Project which should be used when printing.
